roleset.name: to emit or transmit
roleset.note: BEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'beam' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from beam.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: He gives pep talks in [periodic `` family briefings '']*-1 beamed [*-1]internationally on `` FXTV , '' the company 's own television network .
example.arg: on `` FXTV , '' the company 's own television network

roleset.name: to express with a smile
roleset.note: BEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'beam' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from beam.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ``[We 've had the Russians and Chinese , and people from India visiting us]*-1 , '' Mr. Iverson beams [*-1].
